summary: After a failed suicide attempt, a pregnant woman gains the ability to see ghosts.
cast: Thanarat Poonnarattanakul|Qi Shu|Nuhtiya Puppatokasub|Phatanasri Posayanonth|Yongyut Jamsai|Montren Mongkon|Supasawat Buranavech|Wanchai Srimuang|Phurida Vijitphan|Damrong Phutaramgsee|Songdad Yapanga|Jesdaporn Pholdee|Porntip Kunphasert|Jongchai Poomrmarin|Derek Tsang|Eugenia Yuan|Xiao Li Yuan|Shirely Ong|San Yow|May Phua|Rayson Tan|Lam Vengium|Sandy Ng|Chi Tai Lam|Connie Lai|Alan Tern|Vincent Cheng|Ben Cheng|Yuan Yuan Ren|Chuwong Earsakul|Harasawin Lee|Yee-Man Yuen|Kwai Ying Cheung|Man Fan 'Fanny' Lee|Yiu Kwai Cheung|Kamolchanok Kantidilok Wongsa|Tanyalak Muang Wong|Phillip Chung-Fung Kwok|Prayuun Teanchalernwong|Ken Wu|Hui Wai Ling|Kit Ying Ho|Chung Tsz Hin|Sze Mun|Ploy Kittipan|Au Shui Shan|Brandon Wong|Michelle Cheow|Ding Chu Hui|Panatdar Clongchengpuen|San Leung|Ping Tong|Tam Yee Chun|Jarin Seubsakul|Narisa Tungareankai|Chaiwat Ngamngan|Karn Yamsawad|Piew Thongkam|Narit Makgot|Waan Sangduam|Duangneat Manhong|Chuay Yanneat|Pongsri Chalermrat|Pom Songrattana|Somrak Thanathorn|Lawrence Chou

title: The eye 2
